com.shnu.lbsshnu

类 SectionedAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.shnu.lbsshnu.SectionedAdapter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public abstract class SectionedAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    类SectionedAdapter
    用于⒍喔adapter包含在一个adapter中
    能够实现ResultActivity中的list绑定多个adapter.
